conversation.speaker: USER
conversation.text: USER: Yeah, I was thinking something light and cheesy, maybe one of those classic rom-coms from the '90s or early 2000s. Do you have any recommendations that are a bit more old-school?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
Sure, here are some classic romantic movies from the 1990s and early 2000s that would be a good fit for you:

1. " Notting Hill" (1999)
2. "Say Anything" (1999)
3. "Sleepless in Seattle" (1993)
4. "Pretty in Pink" (1986)
5. "Clueless" (1995)
6. "Groundhog Day" (1993)
7. "Pretty in Pink" (1995)
8. "Love Actually" (2003)
